#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

long long int a[105][105];
int dp[105][105];
int main()
{
    int test,m,n,i,j;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
        for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
        for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
        scanf("%d",&a[i][j]);
        memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
        for(i=m;i>=1;i--)
        {
            for(j=n;j>=1;j--)
            {
                if(i==m&&j==n)
                {
                    if(a[i][j]==2147483647)
                    dp[i][j]=-1;
                    else
                    dp[i][j]=0;
                    continue;
                }
                if(a[i][j]==2147483647)
                {
                    dp[i][j]=-1;
                    continue;
                }
                if(i+1>m&&j+1<=n)
                dp[i][j]=dp[i][j+1]+1;
                else if(j+1>n&&i+1<=m)
                dp[i][j]=dp[i+1][j]+1;
                else
                {
                    if(dp[i][j+1]==-1)
                    dp[i][j]=dp[i+1][j]+1;
                    else if(dp[i+1][j]==-1)
                    dp[i][j]=dp[i][j+1]+1;
                    else
                    {
                        if(a[i+1][j]<a[i][j+1])
                        dp[i][j]=dp[i+1][j]+1;
                        else if(a[i][j+1]<a[i+1][j])
                        dp[i][j]=dp[i][j+1]+1;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",dp[1][1]);
    }
    return 0;
}
